organism_name.title: organism_name
organism_name.description: Name of the expected organism. Should correspond to a NCBI Taxonomy node

infraspecific_name.title: infraspecific_name
infraspecific_name.description: scientific name for any taxon below the rank of species, i.e. an infraspecific taxon or infraspecies.

lineage.title: lineage
lineage.description: The complete taxonomic lineage for the taxonomic node indicated.

genome_assembly_id.title: genome_assembly_id
genome_assembly_id.description: Assembly DB identifier (Example: NCBI assembly accession)

taxonomy_id.title: taxonomy_id
taxonomy_id.description: NCBI taxonomy identifier of the organism.

schema_version.title: schema_version
schema_version.description: Reflective of the Data Dictionary version currently applied to the dataset.

analysis_platform.title: analysis_platform
analysis_platform.description: The platform used to conduct the analysis.

analysis_platform_object_id.title: analysis_platform_object_id
analysis_platform_object_id.description: Unique identifier of archive containing data and analyses. Examples include HIVEPack or Research Object (RO).

bioproject.title: bioproject
bioproject.description: NCBI BioProject DB ID. A BioProject is a collection of biological data for a single initiative, originating from a single organization or from a consortium.

sra_run_id.title: sra_run_id
sra_run_id.description: The SRA run accession for a set of fastq files

ngs_read_file_name.title: ngs_read_file_name
ngs_read_file_name.description: Individual name of the fastq file involved in ngsQC or siteQC, or that is connected to a genome assembly id and subsequence fasta files in assemblyQC (i.e. SRR10971381_1.fastq)

ngs_read_file_source.title: ngs_read_file_source
ngs_read_file_source.description: Resource that the fastq files are derived from (i.e. SRA) in the form of a URI/static URL.

ngs_gc_content.title: gc_content
ngs_gc_content.description: GC content of the individual fastq files in ngsQC.

avg_phred_score.title: avg_phred_score
avg_phred_score.description: Average quality (in phred score) of sequences in a FASTQ read file.

avg_read_length.title: avg_read_length
avg_read_length.description: Average length of sequences in a FASTA/FASTQ read file.

max_read_length.title: max_read_length
max_read_length.description: Length (in base pairs) of longest sequence(s) present in a FASTA/FASTQ read file.

min_read_length.title: min_read_length
min_read_length.description: Length (in base pairs) of the shortest sequence(s) in a FASTA/FASTQ read file.

num_reads_unique.title: num_reads_unique
num_reads_unique.description: Number of unique reads that are not identical to other reads.

pos_outlier_count.title: pos_outlier_count
pos_outlier_count.description: Count of positions the quality of which is significantly different (extremely low or high).

codon_table.title: codon_table
codon_table.description: A list containing the different types of DNA sequences, including Standard, Vertebrate Mitochondrial, Yeast Mitochondrial, etc.
examples: Standard|Vertebrate Mitochondrial|Yeast Mitochondrial|Mold,Protozoan and Coelenterate Mitochondrial and Mycoplasma/Spiroplasma|Invertebrate Mitochonrial|Ciliate, Dasycladacean and Hexamita Nuclear|Echinoderm and Flatworm Mitochondrial|Euplotid Nuclear|Bacterial, Archael and Plant Plastid|Alternative Yeast Nuclear|Ascidian Mitochondrial|Alternative Flatworm Mitochondrial|Chlorophycean Mitochondrial|Trematode Mitochondrial|Scenedesmus Obliquus Mitochondrial|Thraustochytrium Mitochondrial|Pterobranchia Mitochondrial|Candidate Division SR1 and Gracilibacteria|Pachysolen tannophilus Nuclear

percent_coding.title: percent_coding
percent_coding.description: The relative frequency of sequences that are protein coding for each DNA sequence type.

percent_not_coding.title: percent_not_coding
percent_not_coding.description: The relative frequency of sequences that are not protein coding for each DNA sequence type.

density_n_per_read.title: density_n_per_read
density_n_per_read.description: A list of density values of Ns per sequence read.

complexity_percent.title: complexity_percent
complexity_percent.description: Percentage of sequences that are complex.

non_complex_percent.title: non_complex_percent
non_complex_percent.description: Percentage of sequences that are not complex.

avg_quality_a.title: avg_quality_a
avg_quality_a.description: The average cumulative quality score of adenine in the NGS.

avg_quality_t.title: avg_quality_t
avg_quality_t.description: The average cumulative quality score of thiamine in the NGS.

avg_quality_g.title: avg_quality_g
avg_quality_g.description: The average cumulative quality score of guanine in the NGS.

avg_quality_c.title: avg_quality_c
avg_quality_c.description: The average cumulative quality score of cytosine in the NGS.

count_a.title: count_a
count_a.description: The total count of adenines in the NGS.

count_t.title: count_t
count_t.description: The total count of thiamaines in the NGS.

count_g.title: count_g
count_g.description: The total count of guanines in the NGS.

count_c.title: count_c
count_c.description: The total count of cytosines in the NGS.

instrument.title: instrument
instrument.description: Name of instrument used for NGS.

wgs_accession.title: wgs_accession
wgs_accession.description: NCBI Whole Genome Shotgun (WGS) accession number.

strategy.title: strategy
strategy.description: Strategy/method used to generate the NGS. Controled vocabulary consisting of the following terms: WGA WGS WXS RNA-Seq miRNA-Seq WCS CLONE POOLCLONE AMPLICON CLONEEND FINISHING ChIP-Seq MNase-Seq DNase-Hypersensitivity Bisulfite-Seq Tn-Seq EST FL-cDNA CTS MRE-Seq MeDIP-Seq MBD-Seq Synthetic-Long-Read OTHER

ngs_score.title: ngs_score
ngs_score.description: Internally developed scores used to evaluate the quality and / or quantity of the information present for a particular entry. Scoring criteria may vary per core data set
